body_html:
Thanks for the information.
That aligns with what I vaguely remember.

I would like to avoid proliferation of tags, to avoid confusion, so I would vote against the -base tag. But I think we will remove the jupyter notebooks from the devel images.

body:
Thanks for the information.
That aligns with what I vaguely remember.

I would like to avoid proliferation of tags, to avoid confusion, so I would vote against the `-base` tag. But I think we will remove the jupyter notebooks from the devel images.
